Текст о компании: Engineering and Production Enterprise «New Technologies» LLC has been operating since 2005 and is one of the leading manufacturers of technological equipment in a block-modular design for the development of oil and gas fields and components for them, specializing in the provision of services for well dewaxing and major repairs of equipment in the regions of the Far North (Krasnoyarsk and Perm Territories, Irkutsk and Tyumen Regions, etc.).
Площадь: The area of ​​the production base with access railway lines.
Успешно: Successfully completed projects in Russia and the CIS.
Следование: Compliance with HSE (Health, Safety and Environment) requirements.
